title: The Economic Outlook and Monetary Policy
content: For release on delivery  10:00 a.m. EDT (8:00 a.m. MDT)  August 27, 2010      The Economic Outlook and Monetary Policy    Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City Economic Symposium     Jackson Hole, Wyoming                 August 27, 2010
